info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.
info.title: NetworkManagementClient

get.description: Gets all the public IP prefixes in a subscription.

parameters.description: Client API version.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of PublicIPPrefix resources.

schema.description: Response for ListPublicIpPrefixes API service call.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

value.description: A list of public IP prefixes that exists in a resource group.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ipTags.description: The list of tags associated with the public IP prefix.

items.description: Contains the IpTag associated with the object

ipTagType.description: Gets or sets the ipTag type: Example FirstPartyUsage.

tag.description: Gets or sets value of the IpTag associated with the public IP. Example SQL, Storage etc

prefixLength.description: The Length of the Public IP Prefix.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Public IP prefix resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

publicIPAddressVersion.description: The public IP address version. Possible values are: 'IPv4' and 'IPv6'.

publicIPAddresses.description: The list of all referenced PublicIPAddresses

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the public IP prefix resource.

name.description: Name of a public IP prefix SKU.

zones.description: A list of availability zones denoting the IP allocated for the resource needs to come from.
